/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene below.

On either side of the street, buildings rise up, their facades adorned with various signs and advertisements. Parked cars line the sides of the street, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of urban charm to the scene.

In the distance, a large brick wall stands tall, its imposing presence adding a sense of depth to the image. Despite the busyness of the scene, there's a sense of order and harmony, a typical characteristic of a well-planned cityscape. The image is a snapshot of everyday life in Beijing, capturing the city's vibrant energy and architectural charm.
